2048.verse: وَمَنْ|And whoever|106|118|1012$أَرَادَ|desires|66|89|2059$ٱلْأَخِرَةَ|the Hereafter|109|132|3379$وَسَعَىٰ|and exerts|90|113|1066$لَهَا|for it|52|75|1226$سَعْيَهَا|the effort,|89|112|10288$وَهُوَ|while he|74|86|305$مُؤْمِنٌ|(is) a believer,|116|139|4317$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then those|92|138|777$كَانَ|[are]|57|103|913$سَعْيُهُم|their effort,|97|143|10289$مَّشْكُورًا|(is) appreciated.|130|153|10290$

2050.verse: ٱنظُرْ|See|70|93|4068$كَيْفَ|how|66|113|288$فَضَّلْنَا|We preferred|106|153|2249$بَعْضَهُمْ|some of them|110|157|2240$عَلَىٰ|over|63|110|52$بَعْضٍ‌ۚ|others.|76|99|1316$وَلَلْأَخِرَةُ|And surely the Hereafter|183|193|10296$أَكْبَرُ|(is) greater|95|114|1897$دَرَجَـٰتٍ|(in) degrees|100|120|2252$وَأَكْبَرُ|and greater|97|116|10297$تَفْضِيلاً|(in) excellence.|122|132|10298$

2053.verse: وَٱخْفِضْ|And lower|101|111|9850$لَهُمَا|to them|72|91|6297$جَنَاحَ|(the) wing|89|108|10309$ٱلذُّلِّ|(of) humility|100|119|10310$مِنَ|(out) of|72|91|156$ٱلرَّحْمَةِ|[the] mercy|99|118|10311$وَقُل|and say,|77|87|2709$رَّبِّ|"My Lord!|82|120|7$ٱرْحَمْهُمَا|Have mercy on both of them|210|286|10312$كَمَا|as|53|129|110$رَبَّيَانِى|they brought me up|151|189|10313$صَغِيرًا|(when I was) small."|155|155|2547$

2054.verse: رَّبُّكُمْ|Your Lord|83|96|3243$أَعْلَمُ|(is) most knowing|137|162|324$بِمَا|of what|71|96|43$فِى|(is) in|58|84|89$نُفُوسِكُمْ‌ۚ|yourselves.|95|120|10314$إِن|If|44|70|225$تَكُونُواْ|you are|84|97|427$صَـٰلِحِينَ|righteous,|103|136|8832$فَإِنَّهُۥ|then indeed, He|125|192|916$كَانَ|is|57|124|913$لِلْأَوَّٲبِينَ|to those who often turn (to Him)|239|272|10315$غَفُورًا|Most Forgiving.|121|121|3883$

2055.verse: وَءَاتِ|And give|77|86|10316$ذَا ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ|the relatives|112|131|10317$حَقَّهُۥ|his right,|78|97|6108$وَٱلْمِسْكِينَ|and the needy,|121|140|10318$وَٱبْنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ|and the wayfarer,|139|158|1527$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|113|25$تُبَذِّرْ|spend|63|323|10319$تَبْذِيرًا|wastefully.|92|352|10320$

2047.verse: Whoever should desire the immediate - We hasten for him from it what We will to whom We intend. Then We have made for him Hell, which he will [enter to] burn, censured and banished.

2048.verse: But whoever desires the Hereafter and exerts the effort due to it while he is a believer - it is those whose effort is ever appreciated [by Allah].

2049.verse: To each [category] We extend - to these and to those - from the gift of your Lord. And never has the gift of your Lord been restricted.

2050.verse: Look how We have favored [in provision] some of them over others. But the Hereafter is greater in degrees [of difference] and greater in distinction.

2051.verse: Do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity and [thereby] become censured and forsaken.

2052.verse: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment. Whether one or both of them reach old age [while] with you, say not to them [so much as], "uff," and do not repel them but speak to them a noble word.

2053.verse: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy and say, "My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up [when I was] small."

2054.verse: Your Lord is most knowing of what is within yourselves. If you should be righteous [in intention] - then indeed He is ever, to the often returning [to Him], Forgiving.

2055.verse: And give the relative his right, and [also] the poor and the traveler, and do not spend wastefully.

2056.verse: Indeed, the wasteful are brothers of the devils, and ever has Satan been to his Lord ungrateful.
